title: New: Goss – Waterfall
body:
Part Mura Masa, part Jai Paul, part LISS, this second track from the purposefully elusive **Gos**s is another indication that the producer is a serious force to be reckoned with.

As with debut track, _I Want To Know?????_, at the core of _Waterfall_ is some seriously soulful songwriting, merged with some almost bubblegum pop edged production. Check out Waterfall below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
